resources.string: We were unable to find the Minetest folder as there is no external storage available. External storage is a shared file location on your device, and doesn\'t necessarily mean an SD card.
Failed to create Minetest mod folder
There wasn\'t a folder for mods on your device, so we attempted to create one. However, the attempt failed. The system may be denying this app access to it. Try running Minetest.
We tried to create a world for you to configure, but the operation failed.
It\'s recommended that you install Minetest before using this app from your app store!
Hey! Fancy giving us some stars?
Enable a mod by clicking the world icon.
Failed to download available mod list. Error: %1$s.
Would you like to install these missing dependencies?
Unfortunately, we couldn\'t find all the required mods :(
Unfortunately, we couldn\'t find any of the required mods :(
WARNING: Make sure you\'ve opened Minetest at least once, some of these mods should come bundled.
This mod is from a well known author.
This mod wasn\'t made by a well known author.
Unable to determine the source of this mod.
We couldn\'t find that mod. Has it been deleted?
We couldn\'t find that mod location. Has the folder been deleted, or is the available mod list offline?
Please select the reason why you are reporting this mod. If you have any other information, please enter it in the text box.
By using this service, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
Not a Mod Store, but a Mod Finder

The mods listed as available are a subset of the mods found on the Minetest forums. When you download a mod, you do not download it from our servers but rather from the original link that the author posted. Because of this, we cannot guarantee mods are safe. No one in particular checks these mods.
If you\'re unsure about the safety of a mod, check its forum topic. Look at how old the thread is, and what the comments say.
Thank you to Krock (aka SmallJoker) for creating Krock\'s Mod Search, the crawler which the available mods list is based on.
Thank you to DonBatman for feedback during development
The app logo is based on the Minetest logo which is CC-BY-SA 3.0, and created by erlehmann
This app also uses several standard Android icons, which are CC-BY 4.0
Thank you to the following translators: my friend Soph (French), Dragonop (Spanish), Adrian (German), monolifed (Turkish), and muhdnurhidayat (Malay).
A restart is required for theme changes to take effect outside of the settings screen.

string-array.name: settings_theme_options
string-array.item: Dark at Night, Light at Day
